_header: Hail blessed Lady which has born / God Son
Subjects: carols, Annunciation; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: Hymn to the Virgin — one irregular quatrain

BodArcSelB26.Transcription:
Hayl blyssyd lade qwych haysborn god son in e[t]ernite&
                    þe laydy he tuk hys playsQwen the angel sayd aue
BodArcSelB26.Note: Added to lower margin of page (beneath 5335); no musical notation.
BodArcSelB26.Editions:
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 168; 1977, 149.
